Name: Mart-Inez
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Grape and grain combine harmoniously in this sipping cocktail.
History: Created in 2015 by Matteo Rebuffo at China Tang at Dorchester Hotel, London, England, using Martell Cognac – hence the name.
Nutrition: One serving of Mart-Inez contains 168 calories
